meanings.definition: To make small changes to improve the appearance of a photograph or image.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys retouching old family photos to make them look better.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often spend time retouching their pictures before sharing them online.
meanings.sent3: After retouching the photo, it looked like the cat had grown wings!
meanings.sent4: Her retouching skills transformed the dull image into a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magic of retouching brought life to the faded memories captured in the photograph.

meanings.definition: The act of making small changes to improve the appearance of a photograph or image.
meanings.sent1: His retouching of the picture made it more appealing to the viewers.
meanings.sent2: The studio offers professional retouching services for enhancing images.
meanings.sent3: The retouching of the landscape photo accidentally added a UFO in the background.
meanings.sent4: In the world of photography, retouching is like painting with light and pixels.
meanings.sent5: The before-and-after examples showcased the power of retouching in image editing.
